maqras.text: Jadom hona vali ghatana ho javegi
Usa de vaparana vica ko'i jhutha nahim
Uha ninva ate uca karana vali hovegi
Jadom dharati hila diti javegi
Ate pahara tuta ke cura cura ho janage
Phira uha khilari ho'i dhura sana ke rahi janage
Ate tusim loka tina tar'ham de ho javenge
Phira saje hatha vale, ki khuba hana
Ate khabe hatha vale (aphasosa), khabe hatha vale kiho jihe bure hana
Ate age vale tam age vale hi hana
Uha nere rahina vale loka hana
Ni'amatam de bagam vica
Unham di vadi sakhi'am pahile lokam vica hovegi
Ate thorhe pichali'am vicom honage
(Hire moti'am nala) jara'u takhatam te
Sir'hana la ke ahamane sahamane baithe honage
Unham de kola hamesam rahina vale bace (naujavana) ghuma rahe honage
Kapa ate jaga lai ke ate vadhi'a saraba da pi'ala
Usa nala na sira dukhega na budhi vica vikara avega
Ate fala jihare uha cahuna zuna laina
Ate pachi'am da uha masa jihara unham nu pasada hove
Ate vadi'am akham vali'am (khubasurata) huram
Jivem dhake ho'e moti de dane
Fala unham karamam da jihare uha karade sana
Usa vica uha ko'i vi'aratha ate papa di gala nahim sunanage
Paratu sirafa unham nu salama hovega
Ate saje vale, ki khuba hana saje vale
Bera de rukham vica jinham vica kada nahim
Ate keli'am de guche
ate phaili ho'i cham
Ate vagada ho'i'a pani
Ate bhanta bhanta de fala
Jihare na khatama honage. Ate na unham nu ko'i roka toka hovegi
Ate uce baî€¼isatare
Asim unham auratam nu khasa taura te bana'i'a
Phira unham nu kavari'am rakhi'a hai
Manamohana vali'am ate ika samana umara vali'am
Saje vali'am la'i
Agali'am vicom ika samuha honvega
Ate pichali'am vicom vi ika vada samuha honvega
Ate khabe vale, kiho jihe bure hana khabe vale
Aga vica ate khaulade ho'e pani vica
Ate kale dhu'e di cham vica
Na thadha na caga lagana vala
Iha loka isa tom pahilam khusahala sana
Ate uha vade papa te are rahide sana
Ate uha kahide si, ki jadom asim mara javange ate asim miti ate hadi'am ho javange tam ki asim phira utha'e javange
ate ki sade pahile pi'u dade vi
akhom, ki agale te pichale
Ika mithe ho'e samem de dina te sare ikathe kite javoge
Phira he bahike ho'e ate jhuthala'una vali'o
zakuma (thora) de rukha kha'uge
Phira usa nala apana peta bharoge
Phira usa tom ba'ada ubalada pani pi'uge
Phira tiha'e utha di tarham pi'unge
Iha unham di inasafa de dina mahimana nivazi hovegi
Asim tuhanu paida kita hai phira tusim pusati ki'um nahim karade
ki tusim usa ciza (viraza) bare vicara kita jihara tusim (auratam ve garabha vica) tapaka'unde ho
Ki tusi usa nu akara (inasana bana'unde ho) dide ho jam asim
Asim tuhade vica mauta niyata kiti hai ate asim_usa tom ajiza (majabura) nahim
Ki tuhadi jag'ha te tuhade varage paida kara dite jana ate tuhanu ajihe rupa vica bana dita jave, jisa nu tusim janade nahim
Ate tusim pahile janama nu janade ho?Phira sikhi'a ki'um nahim lainde
ki tusim usa ciza te vicara kita jihari tusim bijade ho
Ki tusi usa nu uga'unde ho jam asim uga'una vale ham
Jekara asim cahi'e tam usa nu zura-jura kara de'i'e, phira tusim galam karade rahi ja'u
Ki asim tam ghate vica cale ga'e
Sagom asim purana taura te ujara ga'e
Ki tusim vicara kita usa pani te jihara tusim pinde ho
Ki usa nu badalam vicom tusim utari'a hai
Jam asim utarana vale ham. Jekara asim cahi'e tam usa nu behada khara kara de'i'e. Phira tusim sukara ki'um nahim karade
ki tusim usa aga te vicara kita jisa nu tusim balade ho
Ki usa de rukha nu tusim' paida kita hai jam asim' paida karana vale ham
Asim usa nu yada karana la'i bana'i'a hai ate rahi'am pandhi'am de varatana la'i
So tusim apane mahana raba di sifata salaha karo
